title: Spark card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Spark card unleashes an electrical attack spell, determined by power level: *Power level 0: [[Shock]] *Power level 1: [[Lightning Bolt]] *Power level 2: [[Orb of Electrocution]] ==History== The Spark card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] before it was removed in [[0.15]]. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of destruction|Destruction]]
